@cmdr_nova@mkultra.monster
05 Oct 2024

This is incongruent with current trends of the past decade and a half, of the music industry pushing real hard for streaming. Streaming, which pays fractions of a penny of a penny on a dollar, while the rich consume the profits. This has only been exasperated since AI came into the scene, with people absent of talent and inspiration, generating absolute garbage (and this isn‚Äôt just a problem in music, it‚Äôs everywhere).
